trans-unit.source: Specifies the method the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel"></xref> uses to manage virtualizing its child items.
trans-unit.target: Angir metoden som den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel"> </xref> bruker til å behandle virtualisering av de underordnede elementene.

trans-unit.source: By default, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel> creates an item container for each visible item and discards it when it is no longer needed (such as when the item is scrolled out of view).
trans-unit.target: Som standard en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>oppretter en elementbeholderen for hver synlige elementet og sletter det når den ikke lenger trenger (for eksempel når elementet er rullet utenfor visningen).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> contains a many items, the process of creating and discarding item containers can negatively affect performance.
trans-unit.target: Når en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>inneholder mange elementer, prosessen med å opprette og slette elementet beholdere negativt kan påvirke ytelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.VirtualizationMode%2A> is set to Recycling, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel> reuses item containers instead of creating a new one each time.
trans-unit.target: Når <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.VirtualizationMode%2A>er satt til resirkulering, den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>blir brukt elementet beholdere i stedet for å opprette et nytt passord hver gang.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.VirtualizationMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel> cannot recycle item containers, it uses the standard mode of virtualization, which is to create and discard item containers for each item.
trans-unit.target: Når <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>kan ikke resirkulere elementet beholdere brukes standardmodus av virtualization er å opprette og slette elementet beholdere for hvert element.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>

trans-unit.source: The following list describes cases when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel> cannot recycle item containers: - The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> contains item containers of different types.
trans-unit.target: Listen nedenfor beskriver tilfeller når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>kan ikke resirkulere elementet beholdere: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>inneholder elementet beholdere forskjellige typer.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> might have items that use both <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator> objects as the item containers.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>kan ha elementer som bruker både <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator>objekter som elementet-beholdere.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>

trans-unit.source: - You explicitly create the item containers for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.

trans-unit.target: Bruke beholderne som elementet på nytt.

trans-unit.source: Create and discard the item containers.
